key_risks: Regulatory Hurdles: Stringent FDA and EMA approval processes could delay market entry.
Clinical Trial Uncertainty: Success depends on ongoing trials, which are inherently risky.
Manufacturing Complexity: High complexity and cost of CAR-T production pose scalability and cost control risks.
Market Competition: Intense competition in the CAR-T therapy space may impact differentiation and market share.
Pricing and Reimbursement: High therapy costs may limit patient access and create reimbursement challenges.
social_issues: High therapy costs may limit patient access, raising ethical concerns about equitable healthcare access.
